DOC.brief_title: A Study Effectiveness HIV Vaccine ( ALVAC vCP205 ) Boost Immune Functions HIV-Negative Volunteers Who Have Already Received HIV Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: Vaccines may provide route therapy HIV-1 infection boost immune system response . An artificially construct HIV-1 vaccine ( NYCBH ) , use vaccinia virus vector , advantage confer cellular humoral immune response long-lived . Studies show second artificially construct vector vaccine , HIV-1 canarypox ( vCP205 ) , also increase CD8+ cytotoxic T lymphocyte ( CTL ) activity , cell-mediated immune response . Yet , immune response boost volunteer previously vaccinate vaccinia-based HIV-1 vaccine second vaccination vaccine give . One theory vaccinia vaccine 's failure immunologic barrier antibody vector may responsible . This study examine effectiveness boost immune response follow vCP205 vaccination follow : 1 ) volunteer previously immunize vCP205 vaccine may may show increase immune response follow first immunization , 2 ) volunteer previously immunize NYCBH vaccine . Upon study entry volunteer receive one injection ALVAC-HIV vCP205 . Temperature symptom record volunteer day 2 day report clinic staff . Volunteers seven clinic visit draw blood , collect urine specimen , perform clinical evaluation . At Month 3 HIV test do . Volunteers follow 3 month , passive follow-up call end year twice year next 5 year . Counseling avoidance HIV infection pregnancy do .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria You may eligible study : Are 1860 year old . Are willing use adequate birth control 1 month study entry study . Have CD4 count least 400 cells/mm3 . Have normal medical history physical examination . Are available 3 month followup . Have participate AVEG Protocol 014C 022A receive schedule vaccination 24 month study , never participate HIVvaccine study . Are HIVnegative within 8 week study entry . Are negative hepatitis B surface antigen . Exclusion Criteria You eligible study : Are pregnant breastfeeding . Have history immune system problem , longterm illness , autoimmune disease . Have history use medication affect immune system . Have history cancer , except remove surgery cure likely . Have medical mental condition interferes study . Have job work interferes study . Have ever attempt suicide , think attempt suicide , severe mental condition . Have receive vaccine within 60 day study entry . Have use experimental drug within 30 day prior study entry . Have receive blood product , immunoglobulin , last 6 month . Have active syphilis . Have active tuberculosis . Have history severe allergic reaction , include reaction vaccine . Have allergy egg product neomycin .
